message.runecraft.not_enough_levels: You have not enough experience levels!
message.runecraft.magical_book_jei_desc: To get the Magical Book, use a normal Book and enough XP on fullmoon on the Altar.
message.runecraft.ruin_block_jei_desc: You can find it in Rune Temples.
message.runecraft.rune_stone_desc: Use runes to activate the Rune Stone
message.runecraft.treasure_ritual_drops_: Random chance of spawning in a treasure ritual with a Lost Page at the Altar.
message.runecraft.rune_stone_jei_desc: Use runes to activate or change the power and effects on Rune Stones. Rune Stones have effects when you stand on them and release effect clouds when activated by redstone or clicking.
message.runecraft.basic_wand_crafting_je: Perform a ritual with a Page of Spells at night with enough experience levels on the Altar.
message.runecraft.orb_jei_desc: Perform a ritual with a Page of Orbs at night with enough experience levels on the Altar.
message.runecraft.spell_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Spell ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster random spell effects.
message.runecraft.wand_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Wand ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a magical wand.
message.runecraft.orb_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Orb ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a magical orb.
message.runecraft.alchemy_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Alchemy ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a random potion.
message.runecraft.banned_page_jei_desc: Describes an old banned ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It spawns a powerful creature of darkness.
message.runecraft.lost_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Unknown ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It gives the caster a random treasure.
message.runecraft.curse_page_jei_desc: Describes an old Curse ritual. Use this page at night with enough experience levels on the Altar to perform the ritual. It spawns a random cursed creature.
message.runecraft.basic_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Releases a spell ring of weakness.
message.runecraft.nether_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Releases a big Fire. Left Click: Sets a creature on fire.
message.runecraft.aether_wand_jei_desc: Left Click: Lets you fly. Left Click on a creature: Let it fly.
message.runecraft.curse_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Releases a ring of negative spells, but also affects the user. Left Click: Curse a creature, but damages the user.
message.runecraft.holy_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Releases a healing effect cloud. Left Click: Heal creatures and damages undead.
message.runecraft.escape_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Releases a big smoke cloud and gives the user invisibility and movement speed
message.runecraft.defensive_wand_jei_des: Right Click: Generates a cobblestone capsule around the user and gives it damage resistance. Shift + Right Click: Destroys the capsule.
message.runecraft.thunder_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Changes the weather to sunshine. Shift + Right Click: Changes the weather to rain.
message.runecraft.destruction_wand_jei_d: Right Click: Spawnt primed TNT. Left Click: Destroys the selected block instant.
message.runecraft.changing_wand_jei_desc: Right Click: Switches between the block states of the selected block.
message.runecraft.maelstrom_wand_jei_des: Right Click: Releases a ring of wither spells. Left Click: Gives the creature a wither effect.
message.runecraft.storm_wand_jei_desc: Left Click: Pushes the creature far back.
